mapper.select: SELECT vacation_id, m_id, e_name, start_date, end_date, reason, created_at, updated_at FROM vacation
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vacation (m_id, e_name, start_date, end_date, reason, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{employeeName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{reason}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE vacation SET m_id = #{employeeId}, e_name = #{employeeName}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, reason = #{reason}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE vacation_id = #{vacationId}
